programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E211 This is Fate S1 E211
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E211 King of Hearts S1 E211
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E211 Second Chances S1 E211
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Jodha Akbar S3 E5
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E211 Undercover Love S1 E211
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E211 This is Fate S1 E211
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E211 Dholi Beats S1 E211
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Jodha Akbar S3 E6
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Trinayani

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E213 Undercover Love S1 E213
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E213 Dholi Beats S1 E213
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E213 King of Hearts S1 E213
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E213 Second Chances S1 E213
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Jodha Akbar S3 E7
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Championship Series

Former Rookie of the Year, Nick Pagliarulo returns to Kraken for his series premiere as Stadium Championship Series East heads to Tampa.

programme.title: Why Her?

programme.title: Why Her?

programme.title: Why Her?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Oklahoma Annie
programme.desc: Właścicielka sklepu angażuje się w walkę z korupcją w swoim mieście, Ma także nadzieję przyciągnąć uwagę przystojnego nowego szeryfa.

programme.title: Tequila Joe
programme.desc: Młody zastępca próbuje otrzeźwić i ożywić spłukanego szeryfa-alkoholika, aby rozprawić się z walczącymi ze sobą gangami przestępców na Dzikim Zachodzie.

programme.title: Niech Żyje Śmierć... Twoja!
programme.desc: Samozwańczy rosyjski książę, meksykański bandyta i radykalna irlandzka dziennikarka łączą siły podczas rewolucji meksykańskiej, by zdobyć bogactwo i sławę.

programme.title: Strzelaj Gringo... Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Meksykański właściciel ziemski Gutierrez oferuje uratowanie zbiegłego banity Chada Starka przed powieszeniem, jeśli Stark zgodzi się odnaleźć i zwrócić zbiegłego syna Gutierreza, Fidela. Stark wkrótce odnajduje Fidela, który przyłączył się do bandy banitów prowadzonej przez byłego znajomego Starka, Charliego Doneghana, nazywającego siebie teraz "Majorem".

programme.title: Zwali go King
programme.desc: Łowca nagród tropi bezwzględny gang handlarzy bronią przez granicę z Meksykiem.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: Yuma to western z 1971 roku, z Clintem Walkerem w roli głównej, wyreżyserowany przez Teda Posta i nakręcony w Old Tucson. Film był pierwotnie pilotem telewizyjnym, który pojawił się w programie ABC Movie of the Week.

programme.title: Wojownik z równin
programme.desc: Jim Dancer, były bandyta, staje się szeryfem w Kansas, próbując zacząć nowe życie. Po tragicznych wydarzeniach z przeszłości, przyjmuje tożsamość detektywa Cummingsa. Jako szeryf walczy z przestępczością i korupcją w miasteczku, jednocześnie stawiając czoła zemście Berta Slocuma, brata zabitego przez niego mężczyzny.

programme.title: Trzy Dolary Ołowiu
programme.desc: Rudy wraca do domu, by zemścić się za śmierć ojca, którego zabili miejscowi bandyci.

programme.title: Próba Miłości
programme.desc: Kiedy Charlotte Sutter zostaje porwana przez Apaczów, jej brat Sam, wspomagany przez starego pijanego poszukiwacza, wyrusza na jej poszukiwanie.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Kula Dla Generała
programme.desc: Banda meksykańskich handlarzy bronią, zatrudnionych przez rewolucyjnego generała, przyjmuje do swojego gangu Amerykanina, nie wiedząc o jego intencjach.

programme.title: Łowcy kłopotów
programme.desc: Dwaj skłóceni bracia, którzy nie rozmawiają ze sobą, postanawiają spędzić Boże Narodzenie z matką. Kobieta, mająca nadzieję na ich pojednanie, stara się połączyć rodzinę w ten wyjątkowy czas. Choć ich spotkanie nie jest łatwe, matka nie rezygnuje z próby przywrócenia harmonii i miłości w rodzinie.

programme.title: Skalpy
programme.desc: Dowódca teksańskiego fortu w czasie wojny secesyjnej odmawia poddania się żołnierzom Unii. Próbuje on kupić córkę wodza miejscowego plemienia Indian. Wódz odmawia, a konfederaci wyrzynają plemię i porywają młodą Indiankę. Dziewczynie udaje się uciec. Ukrywa się u ranczera, który nie lubi Indian, ale jeszcze bardziej nienawidzi konfederatów. Ta dziwna para łączy siły, by dokonać ostatecznej zemsty na południowcach.

programme.title: Pełzająca Śmierć
programme.desc: Agent federalny Alan Fields, pod przykrywką Jonathana Pinkertona, pracownika Lloyds of London, prowadzi śledztwo w sprawie napadu na bank, w którym jeden z trzech złodziei zabił dwóch pozostałych, aby wejść w posiadanie wszystkich pieniędzy.

programme.title: Święta Trójca i Czterej Rewolwerowcy
programme.desc: Święta Trójca i Czterej Rewolwerowcy. Handel bronią z Indianami z jednej strony i przejmowanie kopalni złota z drugiej to główne zainteresowania Quina i Gomeza, bardzo podejrzanych gości w gospodzie Papy Martineza.

programme.title: Ślepa Nienawiść
programme.desc: Kiedy w miasteczku zostaje zamordowany indiański wódz, sympatyzujący z nim były szeryf próbuje powstrzymać Indian przed zemstą.

programme.title: Fuzzy Bohater
programme.desc: Fuzzy i Shoshena przybywają do małego miasteczka Chedron z zamiarem obrabowania lokalnego banku, którego właściciel, De Koven, próbuje przejąć hipoteki wszystkich farmerów w okolicy.

programme.title: Gdzie Śmierć Zbiera Żniwo
programme.desc: Dwie nienawidzące się rodziny od zawsze spędzają czas na wzajemnym zabijaniu się. Córka z rodziny Campos i syn z rodziny Mounter zakochują się w sobie - końca nienawiści nie widać.

programme.title: Przyjacielu, Spoczywaj w Pokoju!
programme.desc: Oficer Dove Williams ściga grupę banitów, którzy obrabowali dyliżans w Teksasie.

programme.title: Na samotnej drodze
programme.desc: Weteran Johnny Rush wraca do domu, by odkryć, że jego ranczo zostało skonfiskowane przez barona bydła. Dowiaduje się, że jego dziewczyna jest zaręczona z baronem, aby ratować finansowo zagrożone ranczo jej ojca. Po utracie ręki w walce z poplecznikami barona, Rush zaczyna używać łuku, by pomścić swoje straty.

programme.title: Wspaniały Teksan
programme.desc: Glenn Saxon, Barbara Loy, Massimo Serato, Gloria Osuna.El Desperado (Glenn Saxon) jest twardym, sprawnie władającym rewolwerem właścicielem saloonu, który pomaga meksykańskim chłopom przeciwstawić się okrutnie uciskającemu ich latyfundyście.

programme.title: Znajdź Miejsce W Którym Możesz Umrzeć
programme.desc: Wyrzutek, żołnierz Konfederacji, odkupuje swoje winy broniąc kobiety przed bandytami, którzy są gotowi ją zabić dla kopalni złota.

programme.title: Dla Przyjaciela Wszystko
programme.desc: Dwóch kowbojów zostaje okradzionych ze złota w skalistych górach i postanawiają walczyć z bandytami. "Anything for a Friend" (1972) to komediowy Italo-Western autorstwa Demofilo Fidaniego, który po raz pierwszy został pokazany przez telewizję w Niemczech.

programme.title: Ścigany
programme.desc: W małym miasteczku miejscowy szeryf zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i zmuszony do ucieczki.

programme.title: Śmierć na Wysokim Wzgórzu
programme.desc: Ważny skok idzie źle, gdy dwaj młodzi mężczyźni stają na drodze meksykańskich bandytów i złego, skorumpowanego biznesmena. Ci będą chcieli odzyskać skradziony łup.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 19, 20, 21
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Noc Węża
programme.desc: Hernández, dowódca garnizonu w małej wiosce, dołącza do grupy mieszczan, którzy chcą ograbić młodego chłopca - Manuela - ze spadku.

programme.title: Arizona Colt
programme.desc: Bandyta Gordo uwalnia więźniów i zmusza ich do przyłączenia się do gangu. Arizona Colt odmawia i ucieka do Blackstone City, gdzie Gordo planuje napad. Gdy członek gangu zabija dziewczynę z saloonu, Arizona oferuje, że go wytropi – za pięćset dolarów i noc z jej siostrą.

programme.title: Adios Compañeros
programme.desc: Samotny rewolwerowiec tropi członków bandy, która zabiła jego przyjaciół.

programme.title: Strzelaj Joe, Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Bandyci poszukują człowieka o imieniu Joe, który posiada mapę do skradzionych pieniędzy zabranych przez ich szefa podczas napadu na bank.

programme.title: Wszyscy Bracia z Zachodu Wspierają Swojego Ojca
programme.desc: Młody poszukiwacz przygód Jakcpot jest właścicielem jednego z pięciu kawałków złotej bryłki, na której wyryte jest położenie kopalni złota. Z piękną damą do towarzystwa Lulu Belle jako wspólniczką, Jackpot rozpoczyna niebezpieczną przygodę, by odnaleźć pozostałe kawałki.

programme.title: Porachunki Rewolwerowców
programme.desc: Tajemniczy nieznajomy pojawia się, by dokonać przerażającej zemsty na byłych konfederackich oficerach, którzy podczas wojny secesyjnej zdradzili i byli odpowiedzialni za masakrę swojego oddziału.

programme.title: Dni Nienawiści
programme.desc: Benson poluje na gang bandytów, którzy zabili jego rodziców, brata i siostry poza jedną - Susy, którą zwyrodnialcy chcą mieć dla siebie!

programme.title: Dzikie Rewolwery
programme.desc: Okrutny i bezwzględny bandyta zabija właściciela tawerny, który wydał go władzom.

programme.title: Kalifornijski szlak
programme.desc: Właściciel saloonu zostaje wrobiony przez wspólnika w napad na dyliżans. By oczyścić swoje imię, wyrusza w desperacką podróż pełną niebezpieczeństw. W tym samym czasie los łączy go z kobietą, która także walczy o przetrwanie. Razem stawiają czoła przeciwnościom na Kalifornijskim szlaku.

programme.title: Wojny drapieżców
programme.desc: Kowboj Dan Somers i potentat naftowy Jim „Hunk” Gardner rywalizują o prawa do dzierżawy działek naftowych na ziemiach Indian w Oklahomie. Walczą także o względy nauczycielki Cathy Allen.

programme.title: Niech Żyje Śmierć... Twoja!
programme.desc: Samozwańczy rosyjski książę, meksykański bandyta i radykalna irlandzka dziennikarka łączą siły podczas rewolucji meksykańskiej, by zdobyć bogactwo i sławę.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 22, 23, 24
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Pociąg do Edynburg
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes eskortuje legendarny diament Gwiazda Rodezji pociągiem do Edynburga. Mimo zabezpieczeń, klejnot znika, a syn właścicielki zostaje zamordowany. Holmes, Watson i inspektor Lestrade ruszają tropem zbrodni, prowadzącym do pułkownika Morana – człowieka związanego z Moriartym.

programme.title: Młodzi Poszukiwacze
programme.desc: Akcja filmu rozgrywa się w roku 1893 roku na amerykańskim zachodzie. Marcus O'Rileya (Riley) i jego wspólnik The Magician (Magik) są wolnymi strzelcami wyspecjalizowanymi w odzyskiwaniu ludowych przedmiotów.

programme.title: Pocałunek Lady X
programme.desc: Zhańbiony były tajny agent ryzykuje swoje życie, a także życie swojej ragtagowej drużyny, gdy szuka zemsty na charyzmatycznym terroryście, który zabił jego żonę.

programme.title: Rozdział 27
programme.desc: Film o Marku Davidzie Chapmanie w dniach poprzedzających niesławne morderstwo Beatlesa Johna Lennona.

programme.title: Odzyskując Przyjaźń
programme.desc: Dlaczego bezwzględnego biznesmena miałaby nagle interesować przyjaźń? Być może po to, by odzyskać coś, o czym nigdy nie wiedział, że to stracił?

programme.title: Szansa na życie
programme.desc: Steve trafia do brutalnej rodziny zastępczej, gdzie przez lata doświadcza przemocy. W poszukiwaniu prawdziwej tożsamości zaczyna szukać swoich biologicznych rodziców. System go zawodzi, a nazwisko Klakowicz skrywa tajemnicę. To niezwykła historia o sile, wytrwałości i dążeniu do prawdy.

programme.title: Zemsta Lizzie Borden
programme.desc: Około 120 lat po tym, jak najsłynniejsza amerykańska morderczyni Lizzie Borden zabiła tam swoich rodziców, grupa studentek wprowadziła się do kwatery w starej posiadłości w Nowej Anglii, aby urządzić piżama party.

programme.title: Ostatni Płatny Zabójca
programme.desc: Starzejący się płatny zabójca, Harry, właśnie spartaczył robotę i jest teraz celem. Jego córka również zajmuje się zawodowo zabójstwem i teraz również jest celem.

programme.title: Chelsea
programme.desc: Kiedy najlepsza przyjaciółka Chelsea, Laura, zaręcza się i wyprowadza z ich mieszkania, zostaje jej coś więcej niż tylko pusty pokój.

programme.title: Szlakiem Skarbów Patagonii
programme.desc: Współczesny western rozgrywający się na niestabilnych ekologicznie i politycznie terenach południowej Arizony.

programme.title: Kongresmen
programme.desc: Zdeterminowany kongresmen, niezrażony polityczną zdradą, zaciekłym atakiem mediów i niedawnym rozwodem, stara się zachować godność i chronić małą wioskę rybacką przed korupcją.

programme.title: Psi opiekun
programme.desc: Psychopatyczny prześladowca zmusza emerytowanego dziennikarza śledczego do rozwiązania przerażającej zagadki.

programme.title: Stwór w Lesie
programme.desc: Trzech byłych studentów filmowych University of Delaware jedzie do Hobgood w Karolinie Północnej, aby nakręcić dokument o przetrwaniu w nadmorskich lasach.

programme.title: Wszystko w Swoim Czasie
programme.desc: Charlie rzuca pracę i przenosi się do domu, by kierować zespołem rockowym z rodzinnego miasta. Jego wspierająca dziewczyna podziela jego miłość do zespołu, aż do momentu, gdy walka w zespole zmusza ich do dokonania wyborów, które na zawsze wpłyną na ich życie.

programme.title: Półtorej Godziny
programme.desc: Jedno, długie ujęcie bez cięć o życiu Any, która ma córkę, niedawno się rozwiodła i rozpoczęła związek, ale nie chce, żeby ktoś się o nim dowiedział.

programme.title: Czarny Łabędź
programme.desc: Osławiony pirat Henry Morgan zostaje gubernatorem Jamajki. Wzywa dawnych towarzyszy do walki z korsarzami, by uwolnić Karaiby. Kiedy jeden z nich porywa córkę poprzedniego gubernatora, wojna na śmierć i życie staje się nieunikniona. Morgan zmaga się także z uczuciami do pięknej arystokratki.

programme.title: Goliat i grzechy Babilonu
programme.desc: Goliat staje do walki o wolność Babilończyków, mierząc się z tyranią i zdradą. Bogata scenografia, widowiskowe sceny akcji i charyzmatyczny Mark Forest nadają filmowi wyjątkowy klimat. Zręczna reżyseria i humor w stylu dawnych epopei dodają uroku tej klasycznej produkcji peplum.

programme.title: Gdybyś Tylko Wiedział
programme.desc: Jest to historia Louise, projektantki mody, u której w młodym wieku rozwija się Alzheimer, prawdopodobnie dlatego, że za młodu była maltretowana przez swojego chłopaka.

programme.title: Gęsto
programme.desc: To opowieść o wschodzącej magnatce nieruchomości THERESIE JAMES, która dla dodatkowych korzyści finansowych prowadzi w swojej dzielnicy nielegalne interesy.

programme.title: Teksańska bawełna
programme.desc: Doświadczony stróż prawa wierzy, że aresztowany nieznajomy jest niewinny. Gdy zaczyna drążyć sprawę, odkrywa tajemnice, które na zawsze zmienią jego miasteczko.

programme.title: Falsyfikat
programme.desc: Daniel Jakor jest jednym z najbardziej płodnych i odnoszących sukcesy artystów, o jakich świat nigdy nie słyszał. Walcząc o sprzedaż własnej sztuki, wkrótce odkrywa, że jego prawdziwy geniusz nie polega na tworzeniu własnych dzieł, ale na fałszowaniu wielkich mistrzów, którzy przyszli przed nim.

programme.title: Powstanie Izydy: Klątwa Mumii
programme.desc: Studenci archeologii muszą połączyć siły, aby zapobiec powstaniu z martwych egipskiej armii bogini Izydy.

programme.title: Miliony
programme.desc: Historia sześciu dwudziestoparoletnich Azjatów: Brandona (Marzyciel), Derona (Czarna Owca), Mary (Tomboy), Charliego (Cynik), Jaya (Playboy) i Eddiego (Mózg).

programme.title: Wpływ
programme.desc: Influence to historia pierwszej randki dwojga autystycznych nastolatków, którzy z pomocą rodziców komunikują się głównie poprzez literowanie na tablicy literowej, która jest formą komunikacji wspomaganej.

programme.title: Źli Ludzie
programme.desc: Dziwna i inteligentna czarna komedia, pełna s*xu, przemocy, brudnej polityki i sławy, BAD PEOPLE to przezabawna opowieść, która przypomina nam, że każdy z nas ma swoją ciemną stronę!

programme.title: Czarna magia
programme.desc: Detektyw Charlie Chan odwleka powrót do Honolulu, by rozwiązać zagadkę morderstwa wśród spirytystów. Po śmierci Williama Bonnera podczas seansu spirytystycznego jego córka Frances staje się podejrzaną. W śledztwie pojawia się więcej tajemnic, a hipnoza i samobójstwo tylko komplikują sprawę.

programme.title: Zabójstwo Niewinności
programme.desc: Nowy pastor dowiaduje się, jak ważne jest zapewnienie stabilności, uzdrowienia i nadziei po tym, jak podwójne zabójstwo wstrząsa jego społecznością.

programme.title: Brutalna Rzeczywistość
programme.desc: Wyszkolony przez FBI neuropsycholog łączy siły ze złodziejką, by znaleźć urządzenie zmieniające rzeczywistość, podczas gdy jej szalony były szef próbuje ich schwytać.

programme.title: Zerwana Umowa
programme.desc: Kiedy Maxowi, właścicielowi klubu ze striptizem, grożą lokalni gangsterzy, zwraca się on o pomoc do żony. Następnie wynajmuje płatnego zabójcę, by rozwiązać problem raz na zawsze.

programme.title: Miłość Jest Wrogiem Wielkiej, Głuchej Pustki
programme.desc: Pogrążony w cieniu dwóch dysfunkcyjnych romantycznych związków Hank wkracza w świat depresji przenikającej się z nowymi możliwościami. Kiedy poznaje niejaką Rose, wpadając na nią wiele razy w miejscach publicznych, zaczyna się między nimi romans w sposób, w jaki większość ludzi przeżywa przygodę na jedną noc. Hank walczy o sens życia, jako bezrobotny miłośnik przesypiania całych dni i nieudolny w utrzymaniu funkcjonalnego związku ze swoją byłą narzeczoną, Jill. Dopiero brutalne przebudzenie podczas intymnego wieczoru z Jill sprawia, że świat Hanka całkowicie się załamuje. Kiedy już wydaje się, że nic mu się nie uda, Hank znajduje nowy powód do życia.

programme.title: Współczesna historia Kopciuszka
programme.desc: Elle chce zostać piosenkarką i autorką tekstów, ale jej marzenia przerywa nagła śmierć rodziców. Wprowadza się do swojego przybranego wujka, który prowadzi małą niezależną wytwórnię płytową. Jej największy zespół, Sensation, jest również największą bolączką Elle. Środowisko muzyki pop w wytwórni, bardzo różniące się od korzeni country, do których przywykła. To potęguje poczucie straty, frustrację i niesłuszne skądinąd poczucie winy Elle spowodowane faktem, że jej rodzice zginęli w wypadku jadąc na jej występ. Kiedy Ell poznaje Ty Parkera, słynnego piosenkarza pop z pasją do „prawdziwej” muzyki, jej stłumiona ambicja zostaje uwolniona.

programme.title: Wesele dla swingersów
programme.desc: Film komediowy w wersji z polskim lektorem - Wesele dla swingersów. Producent telewizyjny zaprasza swoich dawnych przyjaciół z college'u na wesele.

programme.title: Walki breakdancerów
programme.desc: Grupa utalentowanych, lecz mających problemy finansowe breakdancer'ów dołącza do nielegalnego klubu walki w centrum Los Angeles. Klub wykorzystuje muzykę hip-hop i taniec breakdance do walki o pieniądze. Ratując życie ojca jednego ze swoich przyjaciół, chłopcy tworzą silną więź. Walczą o siebie nawzajem, o swoje rodziny i o lepszą przyszłość.

programme.title: CainAbel
programme.desc: W każdej rodzinie jest dobro i zło. Pokolenie, które poświęca się, by uchronić swoją rodzinę przed zniszczeniem, może przekląć i skazać na zagładę obecne i przyszłe pokolenia.

programme.title: Gotowi, Chętni i Zdolni
programme.desc: Samantha Martin zostaje ranna podczas jednej z misji i jest zmuszona do przejścia na emeryturę z CIA. Odkrywa, że kret w CIA współpracuje z terrorystami w celu zdobycia broni chemicznej, która ma zostać zniszczona przez rząd USA. Nie mogąc skontaktować się z CIA, tworzy zgraną grupę kolegów z CIA, aby powstrzymać terrorystów i zdemaskować nieuczciwego agenta CIA.

programme.title: Zabawny Derek
programme.desc: Derek staje w obronie swojej komedii, ponieważ nie może zdradzić swoich marzeń.

programme.title: Białe niebo
programme.desc: Trójka turystów ucieka w głąb lasu po tym, jak obcy atakują ich miasteczko i zaczynają zmieniać ludzi w bezwolne istoty. Z pomocą tajemniczego samotnika próbują przetrwać, lecz nie wszyscy unikają zarażenia. Ukryci w dziczy, odkrywają, że przed inwazją nie ma ucieczki.

programme.title: Rajska Dolina
programme.desc: Grupa różnych ludzi chowa się w piwnicy uciekając przed śmiertelnymi skutkami ataku nuklearnego.

programme.title: Młody Disney
programme.desc: Film oparty na książce „Walt przed Mikim”. Przedstawia wczesne lata kariery Walta Disneya.

programme.title: Flip i Flap W Legii Cudzoziemskiej
programme.desc: Flap zakochuje się w Georgette, córce hotelarza, ale dowiaduje się, że jest już żoną oficera Legii Cudzoziemskiej. Złamany sercem, Flap wstępuje do Legii, zabierając ze sobą Flipa. Oskarżeni o dezercję, zostają skazani na rozstrzelanie, ale udaje im się uciec samolotem, który ostatecznie rozbijają.

programme.title: Ostatnie Posunięcie
programme.desc: Aby uratować życie swojej córki i odzyskać reputację, zhańbiony były detektyw Nick Mathers musi schwytać sadystycznego zabójcę Wielkiego Mistrza, zanim skończy się czas, a ostatnia figura zostanie zabrana w śmiertelnej grze w szachy.

programme.title: Wagon Trail
programme.desc: The son of Sheriff Clay Hartley, of the frontier town Elder, has gotten into bad company and hangs out with an outlaw gang in which, Collins, owner of the Golden Rule Saloon, is the secret head. Sheriff Hartley suspects him, but has been unable to gather the needed evidence. Collins instructs his gang, including young Hartley, to hold up the stagecoach on its return trip from Missionary Flats and take the cargo of gold dust it is carrying. Sheriff Hartley is notified of the planned holdup by one of his deputies who has been spying on Collins, and organizes a posse. A deputy-sheriff is killed in the ensuing gunfight between the lawmen and the outlaws, but Deputy Joe Larkin, pursues and...

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Hit the Saddle
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers get involved when a local sheriff is killed in this B-western from Republic Pictures. The trouble starts when a villainous rancher (J.P. McGowan) plots to steal some government protected horses. Bob Livingstone, Max Terhune, and Ray Corrigan star as the gallant Mesquiteers, while a young Rita Hayworth (Gilda, The Lady From Shanghai) appears as a sexy saloon singer who turns a Mesquiteer's head.

programme.title: Raiders of the Border
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Nevada Jack McKenzie (Johnny Mack Brown) and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) go undercover to catch jewelry smugglers in this vintage western from Monogram Pictures. This was one of the last films directed by John P. McCarthy (Song of the Gringo, The Oklahoma Cyclone), while Johnny Mack Brown would go on to find great success as Nevada Jack; this was the fourth of 19 films where he played the crime busting marshal.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Wisconsin to investigate an Indian agent's claim that a lumber company is forcing the Chippewa Indians off their reservation in order to harvest pristine stands of pine trees. The G-Men's investigation is hindered by the distrust of the Chippewas as well as the lumbermen. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are ordered to California to investigate reports of an anthrax epidemic and get involved in murder and a feud between neighboring ranchers. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonball's throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotel's annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Quantrill and His Raiders
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective tasked with the mission to infiltrate the Quantrill gang before the Lawrence Kansas massacre.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Plus, Bruce Bennet stars as Quantrill, with Steve Darrell as Bloody Bill Anderson.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie investigate a woman named Cattle Kate who seems to be the source of cattle ranches suffering major losses in Sweetwater, Wyoming.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Cattle Kate: Jean Parker. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, crooks posing as newspapermen attempt to blackmail a local rancher in order to steal his land and property. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, Judge Bean discovers that a young vagabond he jailed for a minor offense may be involved in a major unsolved gold heist.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Dave Morgan, an honest lawyer, faces off with Carter Holmes, a crooked politician, in a fiery election campaign. Things take a turn for the worse when Holmes attempts to have his opponent killed. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Looking through an old trunk, Tagg and his friend Johnny Ward, the son of a murdered lawman, find proof that his uncle is an ex-convict and may be involved in a recent bank robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help when tensions rise between the Iroquois and the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye sets out to prove a man's innocence when he is accused of stealing rifles and selling them to the Indians.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you won't want to miss!

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: Hands Across The Border
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures western about horse breeders vying for a contract with the U.S. Army. The cast also includes such favorites as Onslow Stevens and Guinn Big Boy Williams, while songs include Hey Hey (It's a Great Day), Dreaming to Music, and The Girl with the High Button Shoes. For movie buffs: The music for the title song, Hands Across the Border, was composed by none other than Hoagy Carmichael!

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywood's fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boone's daughter. There's plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isn't how you die, Boone says. It's what you live for.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: During the French and Indian War, Alice and Cora Munro are joined by Magua in the search for their father, a British officer. Little do they know, their father is being held captive by the Huron warriors, and Magua intends to betray them. Uncas, the last surviving warrior of the Mohican tribe and Hawkeye set out to rescue the hostages and the sisters before it's too late.

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Dad Longworth robs a Mexican bank, takes the loot, and leaves his partner Rio to be captured. However, Rio escapes capture and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: The Light of Western Stars
programme.desc: Knights of the sage-brush roar across the plains in this western drama from Harry Sherman Productions. Victor Jory ( Papillon, Gone With The Wind), stars as a ranch foreman wrongly arrested for murder. The memorable cast includes Tom Tyler (Stage Coach, Adventures of Captain Marvel), plus Noah Beery Jr (The Rockford Files) and in one of his earliest feature roles, Alan Ladd (The Blue Dahlia, Shane).

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRC's Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to San Pablo, Mexico, to find out what's behind the trouble an American tungsten mine is having. When they arrive, they discover the mine has been closed, the wells are all poisoned and the town is in the grip of a malaria epidemic. To make matters worse, the lawmen have been followed by four gunslingers determined to give the American troubleshooters all the trouble they can handle - and more. Russell Hayden stars.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney tangle with a gang of robbers who have hijacked an Army payroll. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie finds herself caught in the middle of a train heist led by the Sam Bass gang.In order to get to Sam, she pretends to be a waitress and flirts with one of his henchmen. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955..Directed by William Witney. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Don Haggerty plays Sam Bass, while Denver Pyle is his henchman, Bill Hayes.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a detective who faces the notorious gunslinger Johnny Ringo after finding him responsible for a train robbery. Directed by William Witney. Also starring Mary Castle. Donald Curtis, Emlen Davis, Lee Roberts, Harry Lauter, and Ralph Sanford. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired March 4, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, a con involving the Haunted Hills draws Judge Roy's attention. Letty is among those who undergo hypnosis to recall long past events.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Judge Declares a Holiday
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge meets up with a con man who comes to towns, arranges horse races then skips town with the receipts and all the money that was bet. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. The sheriff being the editors best man, the grief-stricken editor begins to escalate the anger towards a suspected drifter with his bias reporting. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie is on the case when homesteaders are forced to sell their land for cheap due to suspicious circumstances. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A man returns home to find that his family has been murdered in a Huron raid.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye goes up against a crew of pirates when they kidnap two women.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adam's life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwright's to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshal's motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you won't want to miss!

programme.title: Bad Man of Deadwood
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Gabby Hayes are together again in this Republic Pictures gem. This time theyre trying to set up a medicine show in Deadwood, a town known for dangerous entrepreneurs who dont like competition. Sally Payne is on-hand as a member of the troop where Roy and Gabby work as entertainers, while Carol Adams plays a reporter who may have a romantic interest in Roy. Songs include Song of the Dusty Trail, and Home on the Rangeland.

programme.title: Billy The Kid Returns
programme.desc: Who would ever mistake Roy Rogers for Billy the Kid? That's exactly what happens in this actionpacked horse opera from Republic Pictures. Rogers arrives on the scene shortly after Pat Garrett (Wade Boteler) kills the infamous Billy the Kid (also played by Rogers). Though Billy was a killer, he was on the side of the homesteaders against a coterie of big time ranchers. As Billy's death is unknown to the public, Roy gets Garrett to let him pose as Billy to continue the fight against the ranchers, but without the bloodshed. We also get six songs, including When the Sun is Setting on the Prairie...

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: In 1775, Daniel Boone (George O'Brien) leads thirty colonial families to Kentucky where they face the threats of Native American marauders led by rebel Simon Girty (John Carradine). That's just the beginning, for there are even more dangers and clashes ahead for Boone and his party. With a cast that includes Ralph Forbes, Heather Angel, and lovable child star Dickie Jones, director David Howard takes us through one of the most exciting periods in American history!

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: During the French and Indian War, Alice and Cora Munro are joined by Magua in the search for their father, a British officer. Little do they know, their father is being held captive by the Huron warriors, and Magua intends to betray them. Uncas, the last surviving warrior of the Mohican tribe and Hawkeye set out to rescue the hostages and the sisters before it's too late.

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: Clearing the Range
programme.desc: Hoot Gibson stars in this reworking of the Zorro legend with a western setting. For trivia buffs: Hoot was married to his leading lady, Sally Eilers, at the time this film was released.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays James Barlow, an agent from Chicago hired to bring the notorious Reno brothers to justice. But wouldnt you know it? The Reno gang includes a beautiful young woman (Mala Powers), who catches Barlows eye. This western from director Tim Whelan (The Thief of Bagdad) features cinematography by two-time Oscar winner Ray Rennahan (Gone With The Wind), while the screenplay was by noted author Horace McCoy (They Shoot Horses, Dont They?). Theres also an all-star cast, including Forrest Tucker, J. Carrol Naish, Edgar Buchanan, Denver Pyle, and several other shaggy sidewinders!

programme.title: Buffalo Stampede
programme.desc: A big time cast, including Randolph Scott, Buster Crabbe, Barton MacLane, and Harry Carey star in this feature about stampedes, Indian attacks, and plundering thieves! Directed by the esteemed Henry Hathaway (True Grit, Niagara).

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In an episode called Koniakers, G-Men Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett investigate how U.S. currency in a bank vault was replaced by counterfeit money. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West. In this episode, Pat and Stoney get reports that a man is selling salted mines to investors. The two G-men are determined to discover the truth. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kate's Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after he's arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie make their way to the town of Coffeyville where they run into the Dalton brothers who are seeking to commit a double bank robbery. Also starring Myron healey, Robert Bray and Robert Foulk. Look for future Daniel Boone/Davy Crocket star Fess Parker as a member of the Dalton gang. Episode originally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark and his partner Frankie head to Tombstone, Arizona to find Doc Holliday with suspicion that Holliday is involved in the gang activity there. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Kim Spalding, Frank Richards, James Craven amd Harry Harvey. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an outlaw gang plans to take over the town by getting Judge Bean to resign over false charges of misconduct. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this epsiode, Storts and Hurley are holding hostage a doll that brings good luck to a Mexican village. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Colonel and His Lady
programme.desc: An inexperienced young officer complicates matters when a tribe is accused of breaking their treaty.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: George Washington helps a young woman whose land is being threatened by an innkeeper. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper .Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: Frontier Justice
programme.desc: Hoot Gibson is back! But he never imagined he'd find his father in an insane asylum and his cattle ranch overrun with sheep! Worst of all, Roger Williams stars as the diabolical James WIlton, a rival who isn't above murder. For trivia buffs: Director Robert F. McGowan was the man behind several of the classic Our Gang comedies...

programme.title: Hands Across The Border
